Key Match Events: Josh Smith put Texas ahead for the first time with a two-run single in the seventh inning
Taylor Ward led off the game with his 22nd homer
Angels starter Tyler Anderson struck out seven and yielded only one hit while throwing 92 pitches in five innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Globe Life Field
The Rangers won for the ninth time in 12 games
The Angels have 98 losses in the season
Others: The Rangers are 8 1/2 games behind American League West-leading Houston and 7Â½ games out of a wild-card spot with 19 to play
The Angels placed outfielders Jo Adell (left oblique strain) and Kevin Pillar (left thumb sprain) on the 10-day injured list
Three-time Cy Young winner Max Scherzer (right shoulder fatigue and nerve issue) was making a rehab start later Saturday night for triple-A Round Rock in Las Vegas
